verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> Prisoner <WG1198> Of Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> And <WG2532> Timothy <WG5095> The <WG3588> Brother, <WG80> To Philemon <WG5371> The <WG3588> Beloved <WG27> And <WG2532> Our <WG4904> Fellow Worker <WG2257>

And <WG2532> To Apphia <WG682> The <WG3588> , Beloved, <WG27> And <WG2532> To Archippus <WG751> <WG3588> <WG4961> Our Fellow Soldier, <WG2257> And <WG2532> To The <WG3588> ' In <WG2596> <WG3624> Thy House <WG4675> Assembly : <WG1577>
Grace <WG5485> To You <WG5213> And <WG2532> Peace <WG1515> From <WG575> God <WG2316> <WG3962> Our Father <WG2257> And The <WG2532> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
I Thank <WG2168> <WG3588> <WG2316> My God, <WG3450> Always <WG3842> Mention <WG3417> Of Thee <WG4675> Making <WG4160> At <WG1909> <WG3588> <WG4335> My Prayers, <WG3450>

Hearing <WG191> Of Thy <WG4675> <WG3588> Love <WG26> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Faith <WG4102> Which <WG3739> Thou Hast <WG2192> Towards <WG4314> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> And <WG2532> Towards <WG1519> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Saints, <WG40>

So That <WG3704> The <WG3588> Fellowship <WG2842> <WG3588> <WG4102> Of Thy Faith <WG4675> Efficient <WG1756> May Become <WG1096> In The <WG1722> Acknowledge <WG1922> Of Every <WG3956> Good Thing <WG18> Which Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> You <WG5213> Towards <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Thankfulness <WG5485> <WG5484> For <WG1063> We Have <WG2192> Great <WG4183> And <WG2532> Encouragement <WG3874> By Occasion Of <WG1909> <WG3588> <WG26> Thy Love, <WG4675> Because <WG3754> <WG3588> Bowels <WG4698> Of The <WG3588> Saints <WG40> Have Been Refreshed <WG373> By <WG1223> Thee, <WG4675> Brother. <WG80>
Wherefore <WG1352> Much <WG4183> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Boldness <WG3954> Having <WG2192> To Order <WG2004> Thee <WG4671> What Is <WG3588> Becoming, <WG433>

For The Sake Of <WG1223> <WG3588> Love <WG26> Rather <WG3123> I Exhort, <WG3870> Such A One <WG5108> Being <WG5607> As <WG5613> Paul The <WG3972> Aged, <WG4246> <WG3570> And Now <WG1161> Also <WG2532> Prisoner <WG1198> Of Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
I Exhort <WG3870> Thee <WG4571> For <WG4012> <WG3588> My <WG1700> Child, <WG5043> Whom <WG3739> I Begot <WG1080> In <WG1722> <WG3588> Bonds <WG1199> , My, <WG3450> Onesimus, <WG3682>
<WG3588> Once <WG4218> To Thee <WG4671> Unserviceable, <WG890> <WG3570> But Now <WG1161> To Thee <WG4671> And <WG2532> To Me <WG1698> Serviceable : <WG2173>
Whom <WG3739> <WG375> <WG4771> But Thou <WG1161> Him, <WG846> ' <WG5124> That Is, <WG2076> <WG3588> My <WG1699> Bowels, <WG4698> Receive : <WG4355>

Whom <WG3739> I 1473 P-1NS Was Desiring 1014 V-INI-1S With 4314 PREP Myself 1683 F-1ASM To Keep, 2722 V-PAN That 2443 CONJ For 5228 PREP Thee 4675 P-2GS He Might Serve 1247 V-PAS-3S Me 3427 P-1DS In 1722 PREP The 3588 T-DPM Bonds 1199 N-DPM Of The 3588 T-GSN Glad Tidings; 2098 N-GSN

<WG5565> But Apart From <WG1161> <WG3588> <WG4674> Thy Mind <WG1106> Nothing <WG3762> I Wished <WG2309> To Do, <WG4160> That <WG2443> Not <WG3361> As <WG5613> <WG2596> Of Necessity <WG318> <WG3588> <WG18> Thy Good <WG4675> Might Be, <WG5600> But <WG235> <WG2596> Of Willingness : <WG1595>

<WG5029> For Perhaps <WG1063> Because Of <WG1223> This <WG5124> He Was Separated From Thee <WG5563> For <WG4314> A Time, <WG5610> That <WG2443> Eternally <WG166> Him <WG846> Thou Mightest Possess; <WG568>

No Longer <WG3765> As <WG5613> A Bondman, <WG1401> ' But <WG235> Above <WG5228> A Bondman, <WG1401> A Brother <WG80> Beloved, <WG27> Specially <WG3122> To Me, <WG1698> <WG4214> And How Much <WG1161> Rather <WG3123> To Thee <WG4671> Both <WG2532> In The <WG1722> Flesh <WG4561> And <WG2532> In The <WG1722> Lord? <WG2962>
If <WG1487> Therefore <WG3767> Me <WG1691> Thou Holdest <WG2192> A Partner, <WG2844> Receive <WG4355> Him <WG846> As <WG5613> Me; <WG1691>
<WG1487> But If <WG1161> Anything <WG5100> He Wronged <WG91> Thee, <WG4571> Or <WG2228> Owes, <WG3784> This <WG5124> <WG1698> Put To My Account. <WG1677>

I 1473 P-1NS Paul 3972 N-NSM Wrote 1125 V-AAI-1S 3588 T-DSF It With My Own 1699 S-1DSF Hand; 5495 N-DSF I 1473 P-1NS Will Repay; 661 V-FAI-1S That 2443 CONJ 3361 PRT-N I May Not Say 3004 V-PAS-1S To Thee 4671 P-2DS That 3754 CONJ Even 2532 CONJ Thyself 4572 F-2ASM To Me 3427 P-1DS Thou Owest Also. 4359 V-PAI-2S

Yea, <WG3483> Brother, <WG80> I 1473 P-1NS Of Thee 4675 P-2GS May Have Profit 3685 V-2ADO-1S In The 1722 PREP Lord; 2962 N-DSM Refresh 373 V-AAM-2S My 3450 P-1GS 3588 T-APN Bowels 4698 N-APN In The 1722 PREP Lord. 2962 N-DSM

Being Persuaded Of <WG3982> <WG3588> <WG5218> Thy Obedience <WG4675> I Wrote <WG1125> To Thee, <WG4671> Knowing <WG1492> That <WG3754> Even <WG2532> Above <WG5228> What <WG3739> I May Say <WG3004> Thou Wilt Do. <WG4160>

<WG260> But Withal <WG1161> Also <WG2532> Prepare <WG2090> Me <WG3427> A Lodging; <WG3578> <WG1679> For I Hope <WG1063> That <WG3754> Through <WG1223> <WG3588> <WG4335> Your Prayers <WG5216> I Shall Be Granted <WG5483> To You. <WG5213>
Salute <WG782> Thee <WG4571> Epaphras <WG1889> <WG3588> Fellow Prisoner <WG4869> My <WG3450> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus; <WG2424>
Mark, <WG3138> Aristarchus, <WG708> Demas, <WG1214> Luke, <WG3065> <WG3588> <WG4904> My Fellow Workers. <WG3450>

The <WG3588> Grace <WG5485> <WG3588> <WG2962> Of Our Lord <WG2257> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> Be With <WG3326> <WG3588> <WG4151> Your Spirit. <WG5216> Amen. <WG281> To <WG4314> Philemon <WG5371> Written <WG1125> From <WG575> Rome, <WG4516> By <WG1223> Onesimus <WG3682> A Servant. <WG3610>
